start.state: Hello, I'm Elizabeth. I suppose we'll be playing strip poker together tonight.

case.state: I'll exchange ~cards~ cards.
Oh… this looks promising!
I think I can work with this.
This could go poorly…
I guess odds were against me staying fully dressed the whole game.

Oh, dear! Should I be watching this?
Oh, my…
I can understand not wanting to show off something major.
*Giggle* Wow, I really am playing strip poker, huh?
W-what are you doing now?

I think I should cover my eyes now…
Shall we continue, then?
Things are picking up, aren’t they?
Oh dear… is my face red?
Um… nice… chest. You seem… well built… I’m terrible at situations like these.
Oh… my… goodness. I mean… I’ve seen them in books, but… oh… my goodness.
Hmm? But you’re out of clothing. What are you going to-
Oh, my god!
It’s… getting bigger…
It’s… getting bigger…
Oh… OH! I should have looked away, but…

Ah, so you're up, ~name~.
Yes, I agree. A lady should try to keep modest.

Oh, my! How shameless!

Wow, are you really going to go through with it!?
And another item down. The game continues.
It seems the stakes are rising.
Goodness… that’s quite a bit of skin you’re showing there, ~name~.
Eep! They bounced!
I suppose if you don’t look too closely it’s kind of like looking at a nude statue… with hair… and skin…
Aren’t you out of the game now? Surely you aren’t going to-
Um… shouldn’t you be doing this in private, ~name~!?
If you don’t stop soon you’ll… you’ll…

Well… that was… something.
